title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with one command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull, and push models with a simple API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that adds Ollama as a local LLM provider for chains, agents, and retrieval.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous/asynchronous APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem to chat, generate, and manage Ollama models from Ruby scripts and Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli (Tyler Hill)
summary: Community-built interactive CLI with readline, conversation history, and syntax highlighting for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as an AI pair programmer.

title: ollama-chat (npm)
summary: Lightweight npm package that wraps ollama-js for quick chat interactions in Node scripts.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama for quick prototyping and demos.

title: llama-cpp-ollama-bridge
summary: Discussion on bridging llama.cpp quantization improvements back into Ollama for faster inference.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Official Rust crate providing typed APIs and async streaming for Ollama over HTTP.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generate, chat, pull, and embed methods.

title: ollama-model-mixer
summary: Experimental tool to merge/splice GGUF models locally and load them into Ollama.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-use Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, and GPU support for quick deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Kubernetes Helm chart to deploy Ollama and WebUI with GPU node-selector and autoscaling.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK for Ollama with async enumerable streaming and DI-friendly client.

title: ollama-models-registry
summary: Curated list of community-tuned GGUF models ready to pull into Ollama with performance notes.
